footer.title: That's all for today!

edit-profile.title: Edit Profile
edit-profile.description: Keep your personal data private. Anyone who can see your profile will be able to see the information you add here.

website.label: Website
website.description: Add your website or contact site so people can get to know you better and follow your updates. Sharing your online presence will allow others to learn more about you.

account-management.title: Account Management
account-management.description: Modify your personal information or account type.

password.title: Password
password.description: Changing the password on Pinterest means updating the key you use to access your account.

business-account.title: Convert to a business account
business-account.description: With a business account, you'll have access to tools like ads and analytics to grow your business on Pinterest.

eliminate-account.title: Deactivation and deletion
eliminate-account.subtitle: Delete data and your account
eliminate-account.description: Permanently delete your data and everything associated with your account

modal.title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
modal.description: Deleting your account is an irreversible action that will delete all your data and settings associated with your profile.

privacy.title: Profile visibility
privacy.description: Manage how your profile can be viewed inside and outside of Pinterest.

private.title: Private profile
private.description: When your profile is private, only people you approve can see your profile, Pins, boards, followers, and following lists. Learn more.

security.title: Security
security.description: Enable two-factor authentication and control the list of connected devices as additional security measures to keep your Pins, boards, and account safe.

two-factor-authentication.title: Two-factor authentication
two-factor-authentication.description: This will make your account even more secure. Along with your password, you will need to enter the secret code we send via text message to your phone each time you log in.

loading: We are adding new ideas to your home feed!

delete-modal.title: Do you want to delete the post?
delete-modal.description: All associated interactions, such as comments, likes, or shares, will be lost.

image.explanation: Choose a file or drag and drop it here
image.recommendation: We recommend using high-quality .jpg files with a size under 20mb

categories.label: Category tag
categories.message: Don't worry. Other users won't see your tags.

more-options.title: More options
more-options.label: Adult content
more-options.description: Adult content includes materials, such as images, videos, or texts, specifically designed for adult audiences.

cover-explanation.title: Board Cover
cover-explanation.description: Select a pin to set it as the board cover. You can change it later, but not remove it.

info-clon.title: Clone Information
info-clon.description: This Pinterest clone was developed as a learning and study project with no economic gain. It allows you to discover, save, and share inspiring images. Explore a variety of boards created by other users or upload your own ideas.

search.title: Discovery and Search
search.description: Find images, boards, and users through an advanced search system with filtering options.
list: Smart search based on keywords and categories.
Advanced filters to search by users, boards, and pins.
Profile exploration to discover personalized content.

boards-&-pins.title: Pins and Boards
boards-&-pins.description: Save images to personalized boards and organize them your way.
list: Create boards with custom names and descriptions.
Easily save pins to boards.
Edit and relocate pins within boards.

creation-&-customization.title: Pin Creation and Customization
creation-&-customization.description: Customize pins with images, descriptions, and external links.
list: Upload images from your device or link them from the web.
Add custom descriptions to each pin.
Edit or delete pins as needed.

social-interaction.title: Social Interaction
social-interaction.description: Connect with the community through comments, likes, and sharing content.
list: Like pins and comments from other users.
Leave comments on pins to interact with the community.
Share pins on social media or via links.

privacy-&-safety.title: Privacy and Safety
privacy-&-safety.description: We protect your information and ensure you can manage the visibility of your boards and pins. You can make them private or public according to your preferences.
list: Privacy settings for boards and pins.
Option to hide boards from other users.
Full control over editing and visibility permissions.

translation-system.title: Translation System
translation-system.description: The platform supports multiple languages, allowing users to navigate in their preferred language.
list: Available in Spanish, English, and Portuguese.
Fully translated interface.
Automatic language selection based on browser settings.

responsive.title: 100% Responsive Design
responsive.description: The application is designed to provide a smooth and optimized experience on any device.
list: Adapted for mobile phones, tablets, and desktop screens.
Flexible interface that adjusts to different screen sizes.
Optimized user experience for mobile navigation.

faqs.question: Is registration required?
faqs.answer: Yes, to save images and create boards, you need a free account.

faqs.question: Can I upload my own images?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can upload images and organize them into boards according to your interests.

faqs.question: Is it free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, all features of the clone are available for free.

faqs.question: How do I edit my profile?
faqs.answer: You can edit your profile from the settings section, where you can change your photo, name, and description.

faqs.question: Can pins be downloaded?
faqs.answer: Yes, each pin has an option to download the image to your device.

faqs.question: How do I report inappropriate content?
faqs.answer: You can report any pin or comment by pressing the report button within it.

faqs.question: Is my data secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, your data is encrypted before being stored in the database.

development-technologies-&-processes.title: Development Technologies and Processes
development-technologies-&-processes.description: We developed the project with a focus on best development practices, prioritizing modularity. Different design patterns and principles were implemented in both the frontend and backend to ensure clean and structured code.

img.title: Design in Figma
img.subtitle: Below are some images of the initial design created in Figma before implementation. These captures reflect the prior analysis of Pinterest to determine how to develop the UI and what functionalities it would have.
img.footer: Images extracted from the original design in Figma, used as a reference for the implementation of the clone.

code-management-&-collaboration.title: Code Management and Collaboration
code-management-&-collaboration.description: To ensure an efficient and structured workflow, we used version control and repository management tools.

technologies.title: Technologies Used
list: Git for version control, facilitating collaborative work and code change management.
GitHub as the repository hosting platform, allowing branch management for clone development and project progress tracking.

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.description: For building the user interface, modern technologies focused on efficiency and performance were used. Functional programming principles and a scalable layered architecture were applied.

technologies.title: Technologies Used
list: TypeScript for static typing and code robustness.
React.js as the main library for building reusable components.
Next.js for performance optimization with Server-Side Rendering (SSR) and Static Site Generation (SSG).
Tailwind CSS for quick styling and responsive design.
Zustand for lightweight and efficient state management.
Zod for data validation with a typed approach.
React Hook Form for optimized form management.
Axios for efficient API consumption.

backend.title: Backend
backend.description: For server logic and data persistence, reliable technologies with a structured focus on MVC architecture were chosen.

technologies.title: Technologies Used
list: JavaScript as the main backend language.
Express.js as a lightweight and fast framework for creating REST APIs.
PostgreSQL as a relational database for structured and efficient storage.

backend.img: Image of an organizational panel in Notion for project development.

about-us.title: About Us
description: trainee developers in training aged 18 and 20
, passionate about technology and committed to providing
To carry out this Pinterest clone, we combined our skills and acquired new knowledge in various areas, applying

our-philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
description: We believe in the power of

and collaboration to build innovative technological solutions. We strive to improve our skills every day and apply best development practices, prioritizing quality, accessibility, and efficiency in every project.

santino.title: Lucas Santino Steckler
santino.subtitle: Frontend Developer
santino.quot: Developing the frontend of this project was an incredible challenge. Learning to structure the UI efficiently, apply a new architecture, and optimize the user experience. It was a great opportunity to reinforce my knowledge in React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS.

agustin.title: Agustín Franco Gil
agustin.subtitle: Backend/Frontend Developer
agustin.quot: This project was very important to me because it allowed me to put into practice everything I learned in Backend, Frontend, and Figma. I feel it was a risky step, but all the effort was worth it as it helped me realize what I am capable of.

whats-next.title: What's Next?
whats-next.description: A stage of our lives is closed, so we have to move forward with new projects that challenge us. This clone will be updated periodically with the aim of adding functionalities that bring it closer to the original product. But our main focus will be the development of our first mobile app and other emerging projects, which will be more ambitious and unique.

modal.title: This post contains explicit content
modal.description: This post is marked as adult content. Access is at your own discretion. It may contain nudity, so we recommend caution.
